definition: (reduplicated) whether... or.../never mind/fine (indicating acceptance or resignation)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
surname Ye
(final particle, same as 吧)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
best not to mention it/drop it/never mind/let's not talk about it

sentences.english: Vera was in no way moved by either his wealth or fame.
sentences.chinese: 他的財富也好，名聲也罷，都不會讓維拉動心。

sentences.english: But through good and evil I stuck to my books.
sentences.chinese: 不過，好也罷歹也罷，讀書我倒是堅持不懈。

sentences.english: But through good and evil I stuck to my books.
sentences.chinese: 不過，好也罷歹也罷，讀書我倒是堅持不懈。

sentences.english: Forget about love, hate all right, past Ruyan, eventually to the wind.
sentences.chinese: 愛也罷，恨也罷，往事如煙，最終都隨風去了。

sentences.english: Forget about love, hate all right, past Ruyan, eventually to the wind.
sentences.chinese: 愛也罷，恨也罷，往事如煙，最終都隨風去了。

sentences.english: No matter the thick ink or soft pastels, they both are suitable.
sentences.chinese: 濃墨也好，淡彩也罷，終是相宜。

sentences.english: Sometimes you can mess with the computer, for better or for worse.
sentences.chinese: 其實你也可以惡搞一下電腦，好也罷壞也罷，都行。

sentences.english: Sometimes you can mess with the computer, for better or for worse.
sentences.chinese: 其實你也可以惡搞一下電腦，好也罷壞也罷，都行。

sentences.english: You may call me a newspaper addict or free-lance writer.
sentences.chinese: 叫我報蟲也好，叫我自由撰稿人也罷。

sentences.english: It's better for such experts and scholars to keep quiet.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的專家學者，不說話也罷。

definition: in a word/in short/in brief
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
no matter what or how/regardless of whether...
moreover/besides/in addition/furthermore
to feel embarrassed or awkward/to make things difficult (for someone)/to find things difficult (to do or manage)
(final particle, same as 吧)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to advise/to urge/to try to persuade/to exhort/to console/to soothe
to be indifferent/not to matter/cannot be said to be
should not/to owe nothing
only/nothing else
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
in no way/not in the least/absolutely not
